pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister of Lebanon Hassan Diab | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Prime Minister of Lebanon, Hassan Diab, to discuss the latest developments in the COVID-19 pandemic and the relationship between Canada and Lebanon.

The two leaders discussed the global trajectory of COVID-19, as well as its impact in their respective countries. They agreed on the need for continued international cooperation, with Prime Minister Trudeau underscoring the importance of strong multilateral institutions and responses as the world grapples with the pandemic. 

The Prime Ministers reaffirmed the longstanding friendship between Canada and Lebanon, which is rooted in close people-to-people ties. They agreed to continue working together to strengthen the relationship.

COVID-19 is a rapidly evolving global challenge. The Government of Canada is working closely with local, provincial, territorial, and international partners to minimize its health, economic, and social impacts in Canada and around the world.
